video.title: Salem
video.synopsis: This drama series set in 17th-century Salem, Massachusetts, explores what really fueled the town's infamous witch trials, uncovering some dark truths.

episodes.synopsis: In 17th-century Salem, Massachusetts, unwed mother Mary gives her baby up to the devil and initiates a plan to use the town's fears against it.
episodes.title: The Vow

episodes.synopsis: Mary sets a plan in motion that will elevate her to power, and Alden investigates reports of witches that have terrified the people of Salem.
episodes.title: The Stone Child

episodes.synopsis: When she discovers that John and Isaac witnessed the witches' ceremony, Mary confronts Magistrate Hale.
episodes.title: In Vain

episodes.synopsis: An old nemesis of Alden's comes to Salem with secrets that could destroy him and Mary, and Mercy slips from Mary's control.
episodes.title: Survivors

episodes.synopsis: With the help of Mary's servant Tituba, Rose delves into John's past for a means to ruin him. Meanwhile, John and Cotton find a powerful artifact.
episodes.title: Lies

episodes.synopsis: Alden and Cotton find themselves face-to-face with a real witch, and Mary forges a solution to the discord within the coven.
episodes.title: The Red Rose & the Briar

episodes.synopsis: Mary and John's feelings for each other grow stronger, Cotton faces an unexpected allegation during the trial, and a witch hunter arrives in Salem.
episodes.title: Our Own Private America

episodes.synopsis: The arrival of Cotton Mather's father shakes up Salem, and Mary's control over George Sibley is compromised.
episodes.title: Departures

episodes.synopsis: Mary struggles to get George back under her control, and Mercy and her acolytes flex their growing power.
episodes.title: Children, Be Afraid

episodes.synopsis: Increase gets closer to understanding who really runs Salem. Anne finds herself in danger, and Alden may be the only one who can save her.
episodes.title: The House of Pain

episodes.synopsis: As Anne discovers the truth about her father, John Alden finds himself targeted by troubling new allegations.
episodes.title: Cat and Mouse

episodes.synopsis: Increase's blackmail unfolds as Alden goes on trial, but Mary holds a secret that may save John from the gallows.
episodes.title: Ashes, Ashes

episodes.synopsis: As the Grand Rite draws near, Alden uncovers Mary's greatest secret and Tituba shares surprising news.
episodes.title: All Fall Down

episodes.synopsis: As a plague engulfs Salem, new arrival Dr. Samuel Wainwright intrigues Mary, who tries to spend time with her son while fighting a threat from Mercy.
episodes.title: Cry Havoc

episodes.synopsis: While Mary begins preparations for the second Grand Rite and lashes out at Mercy, Anne meets the powerful Countess Marburg, and Alden returns to Salem.
episodes.title: Blood Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Mary allies herself with a former foe to keep control of Salem during an election, and she continues to grow closer to the dangerous Dr. Wainwright.
episodes.title: From Within

episodes.synopsis: While Mary ignores Tituba's warnings and tutors Anne Hale, Mercy plots revenge against Mary and Cotton meets Dr. Wainwright upon his return to Salem.
episodes.title: Book of Shadows

episodes.synopsis: Mary finally comes face-to-face with her nemesis, Countess Marberg, while Hathorne threatens Anne and tries to wrest control of Salem from Mary.
episodes.title: The Wine Dark Sea

episodes.synopsis: Countess Marberg arrives in Salem with her son, Sebastian, Alden struggles with his emotions, Anne enjoys her powers and Cotton makes a confession.
episodes.title: Ill Met by Moonlight

episodes.synopsis: As Mary and Countess Marberg continue their struggle for power, Cotton makes a proposal, and Dr. Wainwright grows close to the truth about the plague.
episodes.title: The Beckoning Fair One

episodes.synopsis: All the denizens of Salem seek information as Anne learns about her father, Tituba tempts Alden and Mary learns Countess Marberg's horrifying history.
episodes.title: Dead Birds

episodes.synopsis: Mary is desperate to protect her son from Countess Marberg, Tituba's plans go awry, Anne continues her dark studies and a brutal feud intensifies.
episodes.title: Wages of Sin

episodes.synopsis: While Countess Marberg awaits the comet that will enable her triumph, Mary tries to thwart her, Anne makes a fateful decision and Cotton faces death.
episodes.title: Til Death Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: As Sebastian wavers in his loyalties, Mary suffers from public denunciation, and Cotton and Alden team up in an effort to undermine Countess Marberg.
episodes.title: On Earth as in Hell

episodes.synopsis: Alden's life is threatened as the Starry Messenger approaches, Anne uncovers shocking information and Isaac is placed in an unsettling position.
episodes.title: Midnight Never Come

episodes.synopsis: As the Countess appears to triumph, Mary rallies for one last act of defiance while Anne revels in her own power, and Mercy faces an uncertain future.
episodes.title: The Witching Hour
